ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This the tartar sauce my mom made growing up, no sweet relish here!  The pickle juice replaces lemon juice for acidity and tang.  So simple and worth the little bit of time.  (I don't like sweet pickles in my potato salad either!)"
ins: Stir the mayonnaise, onion, pickle, and pickle juice together in a bowl. Season with salt, black pepper, and celery salt to taste. Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
